meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order, Pledge of Allegiance, and Roll Call
Public Comments on Items III – VI
Vote to Approve the February 13th, 2025 Veteran Affairs Commission Meeting Minutes
Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment Update
agenda_items.description: Christina da Silva, Assistant Director Office of Equity & Inclusion will provide an update on the status of the Veterans’ Wellbeing Assessment and next steps.

agenda_items.title: Scholarship on Behalf of Dr. Katina Robertson Update
agenda_items.description: Christina da Silva, Assistant Director Office of Equity & Inclusion will provide an update regarding the commissions inquiry into establishing a scholarship on behalf of former D3 Commissioner, Dr. Katina Robertson.

agenda_items.title: Letter to City Council in Support of Filling Four (4) Commission Vacancies Update
agenda_items.description: Christina da Silva, Assistant Director Office of Equity & Inclusion will provide an update regarding a draft letter to City Council to seek support in filling the four vacancies on the commission.

agenda_items.title: Commissioner Business Cards Update
agenda_items.description: Christina da Silva, Assistant Director Office of Equity & Inclusion will provide an update regarding the commission’s business cards.

agenda_items.title: National Medal of Honor Museum Grand Opening Update
agenda_items.description: Christina da Silva, Assistant Director Office of Equity & Inclusion will provide an update regarding the commission’s planned visit to the National Medal of Honor Museum located at 1717 East Randol Mill Road, Suite 301, Arlington, TX 76011. The Grand Opening celebration will be on Saturday, March 22 from 7:00 to 9:00pm.
